name: The Maze of League of Legends
name_original: The Maze of League of Legends
description:
The Maze of League of Legends was created to help completely new League players ease into the game.

It is a complex game, so a maze game with easy controls will show how the game can feel like by using allies, enemies, and objectives.

Controls
Arrow Keys - Move
